After making your purchase, you head back to find Kyle. When you find him, you see that he is with your friend Rachel. "What do you think of this?" he asked her as he held a blouse to his chest.

"Looks nice. You should get that, since it goes well with that skirt you just picked." she advised. She, nor anyone else in the store, seemed to find it odd that the boy was shopping for girl's clothes.

"Yeah, thats what I thought." he said. He then noticed you you walking up to them. "Hey Tifa! I was just talking with Rachel here. Shes been a big help with picking out what to buy."

"You didn't really need much help. You've got good fashion sense for a boy." she says.

"So are you done yet?" you ask him. You didn't feel like being hear much longer.

"Almost. I want to get a couple pairs of shous." he says walking over to the shoe section. He finds a pair of girl's sneakers in his size, as well as a pair with low heels. "These will do for now. Lets go." he says as he heads over to pay for them. Once paid for, he tells you that he wants to wear some of his new stuff right away, and heads to changing room. Deciding likewise, you head to one and put on your newly aquired clothes. Once dressed, you look at your old ones, and figure that Kyle would probably like to have them.

You head back to where Kyle was and see him wearing the same short sleaved blouse he had shown to Rachel, skirt, and the shoes with heels. "Not bad." you say as you look him over.

"Thanks." he said. "Could you please carry my bags? I bought a lot."

"Sure." you say, resigning yourself. As you hand him your purse, and take the bags from him. As he takes the purse, you see him admiring it. "You can keep it. I don't want it anymore. You can have the clothes I was wearing too." you tell him as you take you money and other important stuff out.

"Thanks!" he says as he slings it over his shoulder. "You can have my old clothes too." The two of you head out of the store, Kyle stumbling a bit since he was unacustomed to wearing heels.
12423.title: You see your friend Rachel, and she and Kyle ar...

13.content:
It is an ordinary day, and you are just getting off the bus. As you make your way down the street to your house, something catches your eye. You walk over to it, and see a strange glowing rock. You wonder what it is as you reach down to pick it up. As soon as you touch it, there is a flash.

What power do you get?
13.title: Dan Evans

choices: Mikey  13 freshman and a bit of a geek likes to watch pokemon
133.content: You have the abilty to swap lives with someone but with who will you swap
133.title: Life Swap

1331.content:
The blinding light vansished and toy saw that you where in a bedroom.

You looked into mirror. 14-year-old wearing glasses and total Pokémon apparel. My hair was brown and curly, not too long but definitely not cut recently or taken care of too well. It formed a big, irregular blob on my head, You looked lika a geek.

At first, I felt dorky even looking at my reflection, but that thought was soon swept aside as my mind was flooded by information about Pokémon.

I glanced around the room and recognized every Pokémon immediately. Then I walked to a desk that was obviously cluttered with Pokémon stuff. Not a very productive work environment, I thought to myself, I suppose I value certain things higher than schoolwork. This theory was further emphasised by the fact that all the notebooks on the table almost had more Pokémon scribblings than actual school stuff on them. The notebooks were labeled Mikey.
1331.title: Mikey  13 freshman and a bit of a geek likes to...

14.content:
It is an ordinary day, and you are just getting off the bus and heading into school. As you reach the entrance, you notice something in the bush and kneel down to see what it is. You see a glowing rock. Curious about it, you reach in to get it out, and as soon as you touch it, there is a flash.

What power do you get?
14.title: Wendy Dawson

142.content:
"Well hello Wendy, you have been imbued with a particularly addictive power, you can exchange your body parts with others simply by touching them. Use this power wisely...or not, that is up to you!" a strange voice echoed in your head...before slowly fading away. You immediately dropped the rock, which wasn't glowing anymore and you stood up and backed away from it, unsure what to say or do.

"Er...yeah okay, that was weird!" you muttered, as you made your way into the school building.

"Do you often pick crap up off the floor Wendy?" a familiar voice suddenly sounded out behind you. And turning you saw who you expected, your best friend Dan, who had seen you picking up the funny looking stone outside the main building.

"Only if it glows," was your response, "and that rock was glowing until I picked it up.

"Really?" Dan frowned.

"Yeah!" you nodded. "But then it stopped glowing, so I dropped it" you explained.

Dan smirked at you. "If you say so!" he nodded.

"Its true!" you insisted, your voice raising in pitch, which it often did when you weren't being believed by someone.
142.title: Part swap

15.content:
It is an ordinary day, and you are on your way home from football prctice. You are thinking about your date with Victoria later when something catches your eye. You head over to it and see a glowing rock. You decide to check it out and reach down to pick it up. As soon as you touch it, there is a flash.

What power do you get?
15.title: Zack Miller

choices: That he now had a vagina
152.content: Zack has gotten the ability to swap body parts whe he opens his eyes he sees
152.title: Part swap

info.brief_description: One day, you gain the ability to swap with other people.
info.description:
The story starts out as one of the main characters finds a strange object on the ground one day. When they go to pick it up, there is a flash and the object disappears, and they gain the ability to preform one type of swap.

Main characters:
Kyle Anderson - Average guy, 16 years old. Not very athletic, but not in bad shape. Is a nice guy, and enjoys playing video games.
Tiffany Williams - Kyle's girlfriend, also 16. They've known each other since they were young. Lives next door. Real nice and is bit girly. Kyle calls her "Tifa".
Dan Evans - 14 years old. Likes sports. Best friends with Wendy.
Wendy Dawson - 14 years old. Has been best friends with Dan since they were in 1st grade. Has a crush on Dan, and is a tomboy.
Zack Miller - 18 years old. On the football team at his school.

Seconday characters:
Family members:
Sophie Anderson - Kyle's 8 year old sister, and Cody's twin.
Cody Anderson - Kyle's 8 year old brother, and Sophie's twin.
Elizabeth Anderson - Kyle's mother. Friends with Tiffany's mother.
Michael Anderson - Kyle's father.

Adam Williams - 14 years old. Emily's younger brother, and friends with Dan and Wendy.
Ashely Williams - Tiffany's 8 year old sister. Best friends with Sophie.
Mary Williams - Tiffany's single mother.

Rachel Evans - 16 years old. Emily's best friend, and Dan's older sister. Friends with Tiffany.
Emma Evans - 19 years old. Dan's oldest sister. Goes to college.
Dorothy Evans. Dan's mother.
Robert Evans - Dan's father.

Emily Dawson - 17 years old. Wendy's older sister. Cheerleader.
Linda Dawson - Wendy's mother.
James Dawson - Wendy's father.

Kaitlyn Miller - 8 years old. Zack younger sister. Friends with Sophie and Emily.
Margaret Miller - Zack's mother.
Anthony Miller - Zack's father.

Other:
Patrick Oliver - 16 years old, and is Kyle's best friend.
Victoria Hill - 18 years old. Zack's girlfriend.
Jason Edwards - 18 years old. Football player at Kyle, Tiffany, and Zack's school. Doesn't like Zack, and picks on other kids often. Stereotypical jock.
Angela Woods - 18 years old. Cheerleader at Kyle, Tiffany, and Zack's school. Jason's girlfriend. Stuck up to those she doesn't like, such as Wendy's sister, Emily. Stereotypical cheerleader.
Julie Ross - Girl at Dan and Wendy's school. Dan has a crush on her.
Kevin Jackson - Bully at Dan and Wendy's school.

You may add other characters.

Types of swaps and rules:
Body: Basic body swap. Must be touching to switch, and the switch is activated by thought.

Part: Switch body parts. Must be touching to switch, and thinking of the part you wish to switch. Must be for equivalent part. Arms for arms, legs for legs. No hands for feet and the like.

Life: Switch lives with another. Body stays the same, but people now treat you as the person you've switched with, and you gain their name, family, friends, possesions, physical abilities, etc. If switched with a person of the opposite gender, they will be treated as the gender of the person they have switched with. Clothes will change in size to fit comfortably. Does not affect personality. Power is activated by touch, and only with your hands, but goes off randomly.

Personality: Switch personalities. Gain the interests, mannerisms, etc. of another. Will act as they would, and would do the things they would normally want to do. Is the only power that the possessor will be aware that they have. The sudden change in personality is noticed by those who it has happened to, but they will not think much of the change. Sexuality does not change, nor does who ever that person might be interested, at least not right away. Power is activated by touch, and only with your hands, but goes off randomly.

For Body, Part, and Life swaps, you can choose whether the person you switch with is aware of the switch. Similarly for part, you can choose whether or not others around will notice the switch or not. However, this choice must be made upon the first switch, and will stay that way. For personality, you can also choose whether reality adjusts so that people just accept the change or stays the same question it.
If you switch with someone while you have already switched, they will be left with the body/part/life/personality you previously had.
If you are touching two or more people when the switch happens, it can either skip through you and happen to those you are touching, or happen to you and the others you are touching.

Other rules:
1.No killing off characters.
2.No sex.
3.No other transformations and such, and no one else with powers.
4.No ending the story.

Anyway, add a chapter and have fun!
